title: Katie Holmes flashes cute smile while attending screening of Serendipity documentary in New York
text:
Katie Holmes flashed her cute smile Tuesday while attending a screening of Serendipity in New York City.

The 40-year-old actress hit the right note with a black jacket over a grey sweater along with a snakeskin-print skirt.

Katie completed her ensemble with open-toed baby blue heels.

Documentary screening: Katie Holmes attended the screening of the new documentary Serendipity on Tuesday in New York City

She accessorized with earrings, a pendant necklace and bracelets.

Katie accentuated her natural beauty with eye shadow and lipstick and had her dark hair down around her shoulders.

She caught up with French artist Prune Nourry, 34, at the screening of her documentary Serendipity at the Quad Cinema.

Serendipity started as a book about Prune's solo show at the Guimet National Asian Art Museum in 2017 in Paris.

Stylish star: The 40-year-old actress hit the right note with a black jacket over a grey sweater along with a snakeskin-print skirt

Coming soon: Katie showed her support for the documentary Serendipity coming out Friday

Cute smile: The actress flashed her cute smile at the screening

Star power: The Dawson's Creek star brought some star power to the special screening

A recent breast cancer diagnosis inspired Prune to turn Serendipity into a first-person documentary that will be released Friday in the US.

The screening also drew Danish model Helena Christensen, 50, who wore a long black floral print dress with bright flowers and red heels.

Helena had her dark hair up with bangs covering her forehead.

Snakeskin print: Katie wore a long skirt with a snakeskin print

Teaming up: Prune Nourry caught up with Katie at the screening of her documentary

Flower power: Danish model Helena Christensen, 50, wore a long black floral print dress

Timeless beauty: Helena looked gorgeous in a long black floral print dress with bright flowers and red heels

Kelly Bensimon, 51, shined in a sequined silver dress at the event.

Swedish model Victoria Silvstedt, 45, also attended the screening.

She showed her taut tummy in a long-sleeved black crop top that she paired with a matching tight skirt and ankle boots.

Prune has been an artist-in-residence at the Invisible Dog Art Center in Brooklyn since 2011.

Sparkling dress: Kelly Bensimon shined in a sparkling silver dress

Blonde beauty: Swedish model Victoria Silvstedt, 45, also attended the screening
description: The 40-year-old actress flashed her cute smile Tuesday while attending a screening of Serendipity in New York City.
